'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a summoned {{lc:Morning star}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Trivia

* Wielded with one hand along side [Great Sword (Citzal's Enchanted Armory)](/greatSwordCitzalsEnchantedArmory/), despite morning stars typically requiring two hands to wield.
* Recovery time is reduced by 30% from duel wielding.
